item.title: Splitting single-tenant Microsoft Defender XDR Sentinel logs in multiple company scenarios
item.description:
Introduction
Let’s consider a scenario in which a parent holding company – Contoso Group – owns two different companies – Contoso Beverages and Contoso Food – and uses a single, shared, multi-domain Entra ID tenant for all the Contoso Group companies. Contoso Group is licensing Entra ID P2 and Microsoft Defender XDR, but each company runs its own Security Operations Center, with its own SIEM (Microsoft Sentinel).
